SEARCH
Package qlang.core.internal

Class CommandLine

java.lang.Object
qlang.runtime.core.CommandLine
public class CommandLine extends Object
The CommandLine class contains all of Q's flag recognition, and other CLI tools.

    • minfo

    • helpMenu

      public String helpMenu()
      Basic method to return Q's help menu. Useful to keep it here for easy editing later down the road.
      Returns:
      String Returns the String containing the help menu. Returned instead of printed in case I need it elsewhere.

    • exec

      public String exec (String[] args, String fpath)
      The exec method runs through all of Q's flags, and matches the input against them. Once a flag is matched, it will execute said flag's properties.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments, ie the flags or other info.
      fpath - The filepath to execute from, useful from the main RunFile.
      Returns:
      Returns the filepath, as it may be altered by a flag before being run by the Q Interpreter.
